name: One True Cuddle
storyline: Starting from a certain rabbit race, you were kidnapped by a group of aliens to execute some kind of experiment. From there, you'll be forced to join a certain experiment and get yourself some mystical alien power to assist you in reaching your One True Cuddle, your true owner.
summary: A top-down platformer where you play as a rabbit that's kidnapped, to avoid all obstacles and find your way back to your owner. But... something else is happening...
